serviceURL.fieldDescription:
${callback} will be replaced by local callback handler.
Example: http://api.wipmania.com/jsonp?callback=${callback}
serviceURL.name: ./serviceURL

listeners.click: function(comp, evt) { var form = this.findParentByType('form'); var propertyField = form.find('name', './properties')[0]; if (propertyField) { propertyField.setValue(); } var serviceURL = form.find('name', './serviceURL')[0].getValue(); if (!serviceURL) { CQ.Ext.Msg.alert(CQ.I18n.getMessage('Missing parameter'), CQ.I18n.getMessage('You need to specify a service URL.')); return false; } var store = CQ_Analytics.JSONPStore.registerNewInstance(null, serviceURL, null, function() { var names = this.getPropertyNames(); if (names && propertyField) { for (var i = 0; i < names.length; i++) { var value = names[i]; if (!CQ.shared.XSS.KEY_REGEXP.test(value)) { propertyField.addItem(value); } } } }); if (!store) { CQ.Ext.Msg.alert(CQ.I18n.getMessage('Invalid store definition'), CQ.I18n.getMessage('Cannot create a store based on provided service URL.')); return false; } else { form.find('name', './store')[0].setValue(store.getName()); } }

fieldConfig.optionsProvider: function(path, record) { var selectedStore = this.findParentByType('form').find('name', './store')[0].getValue(); return CQ_Analytics.ClientContextUtils.storePropertiesOptionsProvider(selectedStore, true); }

thumbnail.fieldDescription:
Define a store property or a path to an image: it will be used as the store thumbnail. Leave empty to have no thumbnail.
Example: http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=${/wipmania/latitude},${/wipmania/longitude}&zoom=${/wipmania/zoom}&size=80x80&sensor=false
thumbnail.name: ./thumbnail
